name: slut
content:
slut noun [C]
(SEXUALLY ACTIVE WOMAN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
slang disapproving a woman who has sexual relationships with a lot of men without any emotional involvement
slut noun [C]
(LAZY WOMAN)
UK very informal disapproving a woman who is usually untidy and lazy
